text: Officialy, The Government of the Republic of China (ROC), or Government of Taiwan, are a semipresidentialist unitary republic that controls the in Asia. The Government of the Republic of China, was created in 1912 by Sun Yat-sen and the Nationalist Party of China. The Governement of the ROC, unlike other governments, is divided into five powers, called "Yuans". * Executive Yuan * Legislative Yuan * Judicial Yuan * Examination Yuan * Control Yuan == Political Status of the Republic of China == Since the end of Chinese Civil War in 1949, exists two countries called "China", the in Mainland China and the , also called was "Taiwan". The People's Republic of China claims "Taiwan" is a province. * The Government of the Republic of China also claims the Mainland China, but nobody support this. * The Government of the Republic of China are no longer a member of the United Nations since 1971. == References == Category:Taiwan Category:Governments in exile
title: Government of the Republic of China
